infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: RoadEye needs camera access to detect road hazards in real-time.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RoadEye needs your location to show nearby hazards and report new ones.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow RoadEye to access your camera to detect road hazards.
